Oyster Soup Eric Lease Morgan <copyright holder=”Eric Lease Morgan2003”
1 stalk of celery
1 onion
2 tablespoons of butter
2 cups of oysters and their liquor
Begin by sauteing the celery and onions in butter until soft. Add oysters, oyster liquor, and cream. Heat until the oysters float. Serve in warm bowls. Yummy!
